title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Wormwood Scrubs
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Braybrook Woods in Wormwood Scrubs Park in London, spring 2013 (9).JPG
content: One of the largest areas of common land in London.  Its sporting facilities include several football pitches (Queens Park Rangers F.C. used to play here in the Victorian age). | image=Braybrook Woods in Wormwood Scrubs Park in London, spring 2013 (9).JPG
